gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 138, Suns 111
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Suns, 138-111. Paul George led the way for the Clippers with 25 points and seven rebounds, with James Harden (19 points, 10 assists) and Ivica Zubac (19 points, eight rebounds) combining for 38 points in the victory. Kevin Durant tallied 30 points, seven rebounds, and two assists for the Suns in the losing effort. The Clippers improve to 23-13 in the regular season, while the Suns fall to 19-18.
